programme.desc: Someone's in the Kitchen with Sandy / The Inside Job - Plankton steals Sandy's fur to disguise himself as Sandy and get the Krabby Patty formula. // Plankton goes inside SpongeBob's head to get the Krabby Patty formula.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep130
programme.desc: Greasy Buffoons / Model Sponge - Mr. Krabs and Plankton woo customers with greasy entrees. // SpongeBob tries a career at being a model in a kitchen sponge commercial.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Darker Parker / Lady of the Tree - Parker makes snowcones for everybody in town and learns that saying 'no' isn't always a bad thing. // Parker and Angus make a delivery to a spooky old woman in the Middlemost Forest... who might be a witch!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Sleepover / The 'B' Word - Parker has a sleepover for the first time and enlists Angus's help to make it as fun as possible. // Parker and Angus go the distance to try and give Russell a bath before her stench becomes destructive.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Stress Test / How to Train Your Carl - The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties. // Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Arr in the Family - Ronnie Anne is determined to help CJ get onstage at a Pirate Dinner Show.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep120
programme.desc: What's Love Gato Do With It? / Dial M. For Mustard - After a magician hypnotizes Bobby into thinking he's a cat, the family needs to snap him out of it! // Ronnie Anne and her friends uncover a town mystery: what happened to Bruno's hot dog cart?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Kid Plays in the Picture / Achy Breaky Art - Carl's love for toys gets him caught up in a whirlwind toy review career. // Frida's art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Mission: Responsible / Hair-i-cane - Cosmo and Wanda are exhausted from taking care of their baby, so Timmy volunteers to take over and give them a night out on the town. // Timmy wishes up indestructible hair with personality that can never be cut!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S10 Ep1002
programme.desc: Whittle Me This / Mayor May Not - Catman thinks Timmy has been kidnapped. He mistakes Chloe for Catgirl and enlists her help to save Timmy. // Timmy wishes Dad was Mayor, but Timmy gets tortured by the paparazzi and risks having his fairies discovered.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S10 Ep1003
programme.desc: Girly Squirrely / Birthday Battle: Transmorphers Versus Unicorns - Chloe joins the Squirrely Scouts and saves the troop by helping them get their first merit badge. // Timmy and Chloe find out they have the same birthday and compete for the best party.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep15
programme.desc: Sleepy Time / Suds - SpongeBob suddenly posses the ability to visit the dreams of his friends. // SpongeBob comes down with a case of the Suds, an illness which turns him into a bubble-maker.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep17
programme.desc: Arrgh! / Rock Bottom - A pretend search for gold turns into a real treasure hunt. // SpongeBob gets on the wrong bus and finds himself lost in a mysterious part of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep18
programme.desc: Texas / Walking Small - Sandy is homesick and plans to return home. // The evil Plankton is up to no good once again when he tries to manipulate SpongeBob.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep19
programme.desc: Fools In April / Neptune's Spatula - Squidward decides to teach SpongeBob a REAL April Fool's Day prank, but finds out being mean doesn't necessarily mean funny. // SpongeBob seizes the mythical spatula of King Neptune.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Between a Rope and A Hard Place / World Day - Coach Dobkins kicks Cheesy and Theodore off the track team for being slow, but Theodore is determined to compete. // To celebrate 'World Day' and win a trip, the Chipmunks each get a country to represent for a school presentation.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Allergic Reaction / Lice-enced to Teach - While training for a TV baking competition with Eleanor, Theodore develops an allergy to an unknown ingredient. // After a lice outbreak that closes the school, Dave sets up a classroom in the house acting as their teacher.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Catch a Code / Stripe Hype - Ferris builds a robot for the school science fair but an accidently throws its sequence code out of order. // Corn and Peg welcome newcomer, Abraham, to Galloping Grove by showing him around town and making him feel welcome in his new community.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Forever Home / Broken Telephone - Corn and Peg set out to find a 'forever' home for each and every animal at the Galloping Grove Animal Shelter. // When the telephones aren't working, Corn and Peg help deliver messages for Ms Sassy.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Night of the Living Bread - SwaySway and Buhdeuce invent a loaf of bread soirresistible, it turns their customers into bread-craving zombies.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Pictures of Boo - In need of shelter from a storm and desperately seeking sleep, the group of questers are welcomed into a mysterious house by a strange Colonel.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Dorg and the Xmas Fairy / Dorg versus Dorg - When Patronella brings a tree ornament to life that hates Christmas, it's up to Dorg and the Magicals to stop the fairy from ruining Christmas! // Patronella brings Dorg's reflection to life to do chores.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Return of the Might Meow and Super Lucha / Grumplestiltskin - When Felicity visits Mirror Rock with Miguel, she accidentally releases the evil mirror image of herself, Evil Felicity! // Felicity is having a big party to celebrate her "Cat-ceanara," in which she'll officially go from kittenhood to cathood.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Wild Buds / Depants Tag - Sanjay and Craig make a bet to see who can live the longest in the wild. // A highly-competitive game of de-pantsing sweeps Lundgren.

programme.desc: Texas Weiners / YooHooTube - Captain Man & Kid Danger are tasked with driving to pick up 1,000 hot dogs for a birthday party. // To save Schwoz from an experiment gone wrong, Captain Man & Kid Danger must follow instructions he posted online, but first they need decent wifi.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Cold War / Fanboy in the Plastic Bubble - Fanboy and Chum Chum catch a cold and they don't just get sick, they get sick of each other. // Fanboy and Chum Chum buy Boog's childhood plastic bubble and have the time of their lives.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Doom and Gloom / Law and Odor - Larry has finally snapped under Snaptrap's ruthless authority and forms his own evil agency, dubbed "G.L.O.O.M."! // Petropolis' worst smelling villain, the Stink Bug, has returned to make life odorous for T.U.F.F.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep519
programme.desc: The Singing Whales - Tritannus takes the Seal from the Pillar of Balance. The planets are shaken, and Melody's Singing Whales disappear. In order to restore the Pillar and return the whales, the Winx must fight Icy and Tritannus.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep520
programme.desc: The Problems of Love - Musa relies on a childhood lullaby to restore harmony in the sea. The Winx must now hone their understanding of the natural world and it's creatures to defeat Tritannus.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Rise of the Turtles Part 2 - When Splinter allows his teenage sons, the Mutant Ninja Turtles, to visit the surface for the first time, they discover that the surface world isn’t as simple as it first appears.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep154
programme.desc: Drive Thru / The Hot Shot - Mr. Krabs tries to make even more money by turning a hole in the Krusty Krab wall into a cash-making drive-thru window! // Tony Fast Jr., the son of a famous race car driver, tries to teach SpongeBob how to drive.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Unbored - When Dave takes away Alvin's phone, the boredom Alvin experiences is enough to drive him crazy.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Deserted - After getting detention again, Alvin's convinced Dave will drive him to the desert and abandon him there.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep501
programme.desc: The Great Snack Off - Alvin and Theodore play a seemingly innocent game, which leads to unexpected consequences.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Premium Parker / Toast of the Town - Parker makes some bougie new friends while the Middlemost Post is on vacation. // Angus and Parker compete in a toast-making contest hosted by Ms. Pam and The Middlemost Toast.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Ariel Force One / Itsy Bitsy - When a hot air balloonist crash lands into the Steadfast, the Middlemost Post goes on a journey to help her fix it. // When Parker gives shelter to a spider during a blizzard on the mountain, the cloud learns of Angus's deathly spider fear.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Dance, Dance Resolution / A Fair to Remember - It’s the Sadie Hawkins dance at school and Lincoln’s sisters have accidentally landed him four dates! // When Lincoln and Bobby become friends, Lori sets out to make Bobby jealous by hanging out with Clyde.

programme.title: The Casagrandes Ep118
programme.desc: Bo Bo Business / Blunder Party - Ronnie Anne and Sid are pumped up for their sleepover, but Carl and Adelaide might ruin the day! // After a disagreement with Abuelo, Bobby goes to work for Mr. Hong to try out his new business ideas.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep221
programme.desc: No Pictures, Please / Stuck on the Roof - Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom. // SpongeBob is afraid to get off the roof of the Krusty Krab, but he won't let that stop him from living his life!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep219

programme.desc: The Fast And The Wormious/A Terrifying Round With A Menacing Metallic Clown - In Mexico, the gang tries to stop a giant sand worm from wreaking havoc on the Enduro Slam 5000 off-road race.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings Ep19/Ep44/Ep70/Ep97/Ep135/Ep319/Ep320
programme.desc: Bear Scents/Bling Bling Bear/Piñata Party/Animal Pics/Bear Behind The Wheel/Dragons & Bears/Bamboo Warfare - When he realises that his beloved she-bear adores the smell of flowers Grizzy decides to offer her the geraniums that decorate the window ledges of the ranger's cabin.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep127/Ep126
programme.desc: Vrooms On The Dunes/Bunny Ball Hockey - Bop and Boo build sandcastles by a lake and their GIRAFFE friend, Jeff, drives a remote-control dune buggy.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis Ep28/Ep26
programme.desc: Crazy Hide And Seek/The Painting - Alice has bought herself a gorgeous new cap but gets laughed at when she wears it to school. Seriously embarrassed, she escapes to Wonderland.

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep228/Ep226
programme.desc: Cheer Up Pup/So Long Stuff - Willie becomes sad when his best doggie friend moves away. Can Simon, Esme, and Roy find a way to cheer him up?

programme.title: Monchhichi Tribe Ep127/Ep126
programme.desc: The Invisible Thieves/The Monchhibug Stone - When Hanae sees two Fruits flying by themselves, making their way towards the bottom of the Tree, the Trio realizes the lizards must have something to do with it.

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep127/Ep125
programme.desc: Goliath’S Little Helper/Lost Dinosaur - Clover learns that even though he's not strong enough yet to be a barn builder like his grandpa, his job on the Ranch is just as important.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep327/Ep326
programme.desc: The Big Sky Park Egg Hunt/Lights, Camera, Big Sky Park - During an egg hunt, Stomper and Bubbles collect real eggs by accident.

programme.title: Mush Mush And The Mushables Ep120/Ep132
programme.desc: Mushlers To The Rescue/What A Stinker - Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, ChEp.and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and they’re loving it!

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep32/Ep34
programme.desc: Game Over/Super Alien Hero Buddy Adventures - When Ben, as Upgrade, and Gwen get zapped into a Sumo Slammers video game, Ben soon has to deal with Gwen's superior gaming skills, while he also tries to impress his video icon in the game.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep11/Ep24
programme.desc: A Small Problem/Ghost Freaked Out - When Ben is prevented from riding an attraction at a water park because he isn't tall enough, he decides to go alien to get even with the ride's attendant.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep1
programme.desc: Beware The Beast From Below/ - The gang has to battle police and parental involvement while trying to solve the mystery of a Slime Mutant who's trapping his victims in a gelatinous cocoon.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: A Sunday doubleheader of AFLW kicks off at Broadbeach in Queensland as the Gold Coast Suns host the Port Adelaide Power in Round 5.

programme.title: AFLW Ep30
programme.desc: The Adelaide Crows host the GWS Giants in Round 5 of the AFLW from Unley in South Australia.

programme.title: ABC News With Auslan Ep45
programme.desc: The latest news and information from ABC News. This bulletin will be Auslan interpreted to provide accessible information to keep Australia's deaf community connected and informed. Presented by Miriam Corowa.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep36
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents the week's main international news, as reported by ABC News correspondents deployed in Bangkok, Beirut, Istanbul, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep78
programme.desc: Mariam Saab presents the latest from ABC News, covering today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and updated news from all corners of Australia and around the globe.

programme.title: Wildflowers Of The Midwest Of WA
programme.desc: WA's outback has come to life with a kaleidoscope of colours! ABC filmmaker Chris Lewis brings the seasonal wildflowers, stories and characters of the Midwest to the world in a unique visual style.

programme.title: ABC News Sunday Ep39
programme.desc: A complete round-up of today's top stories, the latest news and the issues that matter to you. ABC News Sunday brings together the best reporting from across the nation and extended special reports. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: The Bride Flights
programme.desc: The one-way ticket from Spain that changed Australian migration. The women came to work, but the real intention of the government was to balance the gender makeup of the Spanish community. These are some of the stories.

programme.title: Movin' To The Country Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Halina goes to Kangaroo Island to meet the owner of a wildlife sanctuary who rebounded from the 2020 bushfires, Kristy meets some footy legends in the Clare Valley and Craig is in the Barossa Valley, on a sheep farm. (Final)

programme.title: Who Gets To Stay In Australia? Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - An Italian family faces being torn apart, an Irish couple fight for their son, and a man in detention makes his last desperate bid to prevent his deportation to a country he barely knows.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Australia's Oceans Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The Southern Ocean is the only ocean that stretches unbroken around the globe. Aaron Pedersen examines how the cold southernmost waters, reaching from Australia to encircle the Antarctic, are rich and productive.

programme.title: Art Works Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - We chat to artists using novel methods and materials: Safa El Samad, who uses embroidery to upcycle clothes; and Jordan Benson, who works with stained glass. We also meet comedian Gabbi Bolt and Bigambul poet Uncle Wes Marne.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Jamie Durie is one of our most dynamic TV personalities. He's led an interesting life that has had its challenges. Can Anh capture his charisma and passion?

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep78
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Landline Ep33
programme.desc: FMD concerns over people entering pastoral properties in WA; a progress report on Inland Rail; and meet Australia's latest Landcare winner.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep78
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Insiders Ep35

programme.desc: A unique time-lapse photography project. Shot by pros and non-pros from around the world, on the transience of nature, celestial phenomena, cityscapes and each single moment of everyday life.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Crests are symbols of families and organizations. Once the privilege of the imperial and samurai classes, they were adopted by merchants and the populace as marks of pride.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: Seaside town Hakodate, located south of Hokkaido, is known as a good place to catch various types of fish. Our program host tries sea fishing, aiming to catch flatfish and squid.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: low-pain needles & sports wheelchairs.

programme.title: 100 Ideas To Save The World
programme.desc: In this episode, four stories about salvaging unlikely things that were meant for the trash. See how they're upcycled into various items that create new value thanks to ingenious ideas.

programme.title: Doki Doki! NHK World-Japan
